name: Ptolemaic Admin Insights MCP
description: Exposes read-only administrative insights for the CGS Ptolemaic platform, including users, data providers, and high-level application status.

endpoints.description: Primary JSON-RPC endpoint for the Admin Insights MCP server.

users.title: Registered Users
users.description: Provides a snapshot of registered users with optional filters for search, role, verification status, and limit.

search.description: Optional substring to match against the user name or email.

role.description: Optional role name used to filter the users.

limit.description: Maximum number of users to return (defaults to 25, maximum 50).

providers.title: Registered Providers
providers.description: Lists registered providers across AI, market data, news, and trading integrations with optional filters.

type.description: Restrict results to a specific provider category.

search.description: Optional substring to match against the provider slug or display name.

limit.description: Maximum number of providers to return (defaults to 25, maximum 50).

app-status.title: Application Status Overview
app-status.description: Returns an operational snapshot with aggregate counts and recent activity for users and providers.
